delete_data_confirmation.title: Delete Data?
delete_data_confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to delete all your data?

landingpage.title: Health 19
landingpage.questionnaire_exists: You have already answered the Questionnaire

start_over_confirmation.title: Discard Data?
start_over_confirmation.text: Are you sure you want to discard all your data?

anamnese.title: Digital Anamnesis
anamnese.text1: The Health 19 App includes a digital Questionnaire to evaluate Covid-19 Symptoms
anamnese.text2: The Questionnaire is based on a list of questions of the Charit√© Berlin

assessment.title: Risk Assessment
assessment.text1: At the end of the Questionnaire you will get a summary of your answers
assessment.text2: You also receive an assessment of your infection risk

connect.title: Contact
connect.text1: We show you relevant contact persons and redirect you to the offices responsible for you

progress.title: Show Test Result
progress.text1: Get your Test Result as soon as it is available
progress.text2: You can also get notified automatically to not miss it

1.title: The Questionnaire
1.text: Answering the questionnaire approximately takes 5 minutes of your time and asks about acute symptoms, health conditions, travels in risky regions and contact to suspected cases. Please try to answer as accurately as possible.

2.title: Your Data
2.text: The questionnaire is anonymous and is only edited and saved on your device. Your answers will not be transmitted over the internet to us or others.

3.title: See a doctor when in doubt!
3.text: The usage of this app does not replace treatment by a medical professional. If you feel critically ill, please seek medical help immediately. This application is not an application that provides diagnostic services. The application serves to simplify the procedures in care.

medium.title: Medium Risk
medium.text: You have a medium risk to be infected with Corona

low.title: Low Risk
low.text: You have a low risk to be infected with Corona

high.title: High Risk
high.text: You have a high risk to be infected with Corona

1.title: Hand hygiene
1.text1: Pay attention to your hand hygiene
1.text2: Wash your hands often and thoroughly

2.title: Stay at home
2.text1: Stay at home as possible and avoid other people

3.title: Social Distancing
3.text1: Should you leave the house, please keep a distance of 1,5m to other people
3.text2: The usage of a mask is appropriate, especially if the minimum distance can not be adhered to

4.title: Call when in doubt
4.text1: Should you have doubts or questions please contact your doctor
4.text2: You can also call your local health office

restart.title: Complete Questionnaire again
restart.text1: Should you experience more symptoms in the next days you can always restart the questionnaire

account.title: Account
account.text: The Account overview is displayed here, including test results and other stuff

signup.title: Sign up
signup.text: The Sign up form belongs on this page
